Canterbury scrub fire: Road reopened, but Hurunui fire still burning https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/canterbury-scrub-fire-fire-road-reopend-but-hurunui-fire--fire---------nilling/eawqk62ldbhoniusuxxjfs2jva/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/canterbury-scrub-fire-fire-road-reopend-but-hurunui-fire--fire---------nilling/eawqk62ldbhoniusuxxjfs2jva/ Several houses on SH7 were evacuated as fire crews battled the blaze. Photo / Fire and Emergency New Zealand
